summary: After witnessing his father's murder by the hand of the ruthless General Sargon, Mathayus travels to the Underworld to retrieve the enchanted Sword of Damocles from the dark deity, Astarte. Can he thwart the usurper's megalomaniac vision?
cast: Michael Copon|Karen David|Simon Quarterman|Tom Wu|Andreas Wisniewski|Randy Couture|Natalie Becker|Jeremy Crutchley|Shane Manie|Peter Butler|Chase Agulhas|Pierre Marais|Warrick Grier|Terry Norton|Az Abrahams|Abbie Maybanks|Raffaele Sabatini|Marion Holm|Vaneshran Arumugam|Mike Thompson|Muhammed-Reza Savant|Anthony Rowe|Clayton Herolds|Wayne Shields|Robin Smith|Diane Wilson|Nathan Fredericks|Vincent Andrews|Christian Bennett|Clayton Evertson|Sean Higgs|Amira Quinlan|Clodagh Quinlan|Emma Walsh
keywords: coming of age|shared universe|strong female character|loyalty|hero
title: El rey escorpión 2: El nacimiento del guerrero
